price: 29. Kasi soki bolingi Allah na motindami waye, na efandelo ya mokolo ya suka, ya soló Allah abombeli babongisi kati na bino (basi) lifuta linene.
arabic: وَإِن كُنتُنَّ تُرِدۡنَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَٱلدَّارَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَعَدَّ لِلۡمُحۡسِنَٰتِ مِنكُنَّ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-in kuntunna turid'na al-laha warasūlahu wal-dāra al-ākhirata fa-inna al-laha aʿadda lil'muḥ'sināti minkunna ajran ʿaẓīman
